Sentencas: Direct carbon fuel cells offer twice the efficiency compared with conventional coal-fired power plants and the highest efficiency among various fuel cells.
Titulo: Yttria-doped ceria anode for carbon-fueled solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: However, the delivery of solid fuel to electrode/electrolyte interface is a critical issue and hinders the long-term performance of the fuel cell.
Titulo: Yttria-doped ceria anode for carbon-fueled solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: The use of mixed ionic electronic conducting anodes has the potential to reduce the problem by shifting the fuel oxidation reaction from anode/electrolyte to anode/solid carbon interface.
Titulo: Yttria-doped ceria anode for carbon-fueled solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: In search for a better anode material, Y2O3-doped ceria has been investigated as a suitable anode material for use in direct carbon fuel cells and the performance compared with Gd2O3-doped ceria.
Titulo: Yttria-doped ceria anode for carbon-fueled solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: These materials have high ionic conductivity in oxidizing environments and are also known to have reasonable mixed ionic and electronic conductivity in reducing environments.
Titulo: Yttria-doped ceria anode for carbon-fueled solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: In this manuscript, the stability of the anode materials in fuel cell operating environments has been investigated with X-ray diffraction (XRD) and scanning electron microscopy.
Titulo: Yttria-doped ceria anode for carbon-fueled solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: Electrochemical impedance spectroscopy, in pure N-2 and CO2/N-2 anode chamber atmospheres, has been used to deconvolute the contribution of various fuel cell components to voltage losses and to elucidate the reaction mechanism.
Titulo: Yttria-doped ceria anode for carbon-fueled solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: No precious metals were used on the anode side, neither as a catalyst nor as a current collector.
Titulo: Yttria-doped ceria anode for carbon-fueled solid oxide fuel cell
